main event: A UFO sighting was reported involving unusual white lights over Dallas, Texas on June 3, 1952, observed for 1-2 seconds.
interesting points: Witnesses reported unusual lights moving in the vicinity of Dallas, Texas, Several sightings were reported around the same time from different locations, Some witnesses described seeing objects emitting reddish and bluish glows, The sightings raised the attention of military agencies, but later were attributed to astronomical objects or possibly flares, No photographs were available to support the claims.
witness description: A military observer reported the sighting, but detailed descriptions were not provided in the report.
